action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Stockholm
TO: Stuttgart
BY: Train
CLASS: The cheapest
WHEN: On August 15

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your place of departure? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No.

ANSWER: No, not yet.

TRAVEL-AGENT: Hi there! I see you're interested in booking a train ticket. Can you please tell me your departure city?

ANSWER: Yes, I would like to travel from Stockholm.

TRAVEL-AGENT: Great, thank you. And where would you like to go?

ANSWER: Stuttgart.
no
